artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Publisher: Published by Tsuruya Kiemon
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Written on the lantern: namu amida butsu (praying words), zokumyō Iwa-jo (the name of the woman who became a ghost)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: Saki no Hokusai hitsu 前北斎筆
title: The Ghost of Oiwa
